name: Picture Puzzle
overview: A single player, picture puzzle game by Peter Wheatstone, released in 1987 as part of the Amiga Power Pack compilation of games, where, in the latest versions, you can set the number of puzzle pieces, if it is a timed game. If horizontal and vertical flips are required to solve the puzzle, change or turn off music. You can pick and add to available pictures to choose from. It was later released with improvements to public domain in 1992 or 1994.
